sentences.sContent: They headed the storm crossing over Alps to Italy.
sentences.sCn: 他们迎着暴风雪越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，朝着意大利进发。

sentences.sContent: French troops negotiated the Alps and went on the road in Italy.
sentences.sCn: 法军成功地越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，行军在意大利的国土上。

sentences.sContent: The high mountainous Alps in the west of Austria flatten somewhat into low lands and plains in the east of the country.
sentences.sCn: 奥地利西面的阿尔卑斯高山变得有些平坦，直接和国家的东面的低地和平原融为一体。

phrases.pCn: 巴伐利亚山脉；巴伐利亚阿尔卑斯山脉
